00027 #ifndef KADEMLIA_KADEMLIA_UDPFIREWALLTESTER_H
00028 #define KADEMLIA_KADEMLIA_UDPFIREWALLTESTER_H
00029 
00030 #include "Kademlia.h"
00031 #include "../routing/Contact.h"
00032 #include <list>
00033 
00034 namespace Kademlia
00035 {
00036 
00037 class CUInt128;
00038 class CKadUDPKey;
00039 
00040 struct UsedClient_Struct {
00041     CContact    contact;
00042     bool        answered;
00043 };
00044 
00045 #define UDP_FIREWALLTEST_CLIENTSTOASK   2   // more clients increase the chance of a false positive, while less the chance of a false negative
00046 
00047 class CUDPFirewallTester
00048 {
00049       public:
00050     static bool IsFirewalledUDP(bool lastStateIfTesting); // Are we UDP firewalled - if unknown open is assumed unless onlyVerified == true
00051     static void SetUDPFWCheckResult(bool succeeded, bool testCancelled, uint32_t fromIP, uint16_t incomingPort);
00052     static void ReCheckFirewallUDP(bool setUnverified);
00053     static bool IsFWCheckUDPRunning() throw()       { return m_fwChecksFinishedUDP < UDP_FIREWALLTEST_CLIENTSTOASK && !CKademlia::IsRunningInLANMode(); }
00054     static bool IsVerified() throw()            { return m_isFWVerifiedUDP || CKademlia::IsRunningInLANMode(); }
00055 
00056     static void AddPossibleTestContact(const CUInt128& clientID, uint32_t ip, uint16_t port, uint16_t tport, const CUInt128& target, uint8_t version, const CKadUDPKey& udpKey, bool ipVerified)
00057     {
00058         if (!IsFWCheckUDPRunning()) {
00059             return;
00060         }
00061         // add the possible contact to our list - no checks in advance
00062         m_possibleTestClients.push_front(CContact(clientID, ip, port, tport, version, udpKey, ipVerified, target));
00063         QueryNextClient();
00064     }
00065 
00066     static void Reset(); // when stopping Kad
00067     static void Connected();
00068     static void QueryNextClient(); // try the next available client for the firewallcheck
00069 
00070       private:
00071     // are we in search for testclients
00072     static bool GetUDPCheckClientsNeeded() throw()  { return (m_fwChecksRunningUDP + m_fwChecksFinishedUDP) < UDP_FIREWALLTEST_CLIENTSTOASK; }
00073     static bool m_firewalledUDP;
00074     static bool m_firewalledLastStateUDP;
00075     static bool m_isFWVerifiedUDP;
00076     static bool m_nodeSearchStarted;
00077     static bool m_timedOut;
00078     static uint8_t  m_fwChecksRunningUDP;
00079     static uint8_t  m_fwChecksFinishedUDP;
00080     static uint32_t m_testStart;
00081     static uint32_t m_lastSucceededTime;
00082     typedef std::list<CContact> PossibleClientList;
00083     typedef std::list<UsedClient_Struct> UsedClientList;
00084     static PossibleClientList m_possibleTestClients;
00085     static UsedClientList   m_usedTestClients;
00086 };
00087 
00088 } // namespace Kademlia
00089 
00090 #endif /* KADEMLIA_KADEMLIA_UDPFIREWALLTESTER */
